text: Lyonetia praefulva is a moth in the Lyonetiidae family. ==Distribution== It is known from the Sri Lanka and Khassis, India. This species has a wingspan of 8–11 mm. The forewings are shining white with a ferruginous-brown apical blotch.Meyrick, 1911. Descriptions of Indian Micro-Lepidoptera. Part XIV. Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society. Vol.XXI: 104-131. ==References== Category:Lyonetiidae Category:Moths described in 1911
title: Lyonetia praefulva
